attributes.action: Ban I.C.T from being a compulsary subject
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should we do a subject what is non-enjoyable and boring. please give others the chance to decide for themselves what to choose except core subjebts. please mr bliar help people that do no tlike ict and let them learn a subject better for them

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
